function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate coverage of ITNs","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Increase investment in coverage of ITNs and develop additional tools for vector control","Technologies":"ITNs, vector control tools","People":"Populations in areas with inadequate ITN coverage","Owner":"WHO, government health agencies"},{"Description":"High rainfall in some parts of SSA","Impact":"Increased breeding habitats for disease-carrying mosquitoes","Mitigation":"Implement drainage and water management strategies to eliminate breeding sites","Technologies":"Drainage systems, water management tools","People":"Populations in areas with high rainfall","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Insecticide resistance","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of vector control methods","Mitigation":"Develop alternative insecticide compounds and rotation strategies, and invest in resistance monitoring","Technologies":"New insecticide compounds, resistance monitoring tools","People":"Communities reliant on insecticide-based vector control","Owner":"Research institutions, vector control programs"}]}
